message.body: Boloco box with lettuce instead of rice!
Healthy options for dinner in Longwood medical area!
That's definitely better than regular bolocco but I feel like their meat isn't so great. What do you think?
I get desperate for protein. Their produce isn't so great either....
Someone could make a fortune on students with a dinner in the Area

I know, it would make such a difference! The courtyard cafe (and other cafeterias) in one of Harvard's buildings really isn't too bad. You should try it. Not sure if non-Harvard gets a discount though. Open for breakfast and lunch.
Actually, I'm not even sure if non-Harvard students can get in. I'll find out for you
Hmmm let's get breakfast sometime together !!!!

That would be great! I have exams every week for the next three though and I usually study in the mornings. I get a lunch break on Tuesdays and Wednesdays though at 12:30 if you're around before three weeks!
